DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , parallel , 2-arm , multicenter study compare administration Herceptin ( trastuzumab ) single-use injection device versus handheld syringe healthy male volunteer . The volunteer receive single dose 600 mg Herceptin . The anticipated time study 21 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Administration Trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) Single-use Injection Device Versus Handheld Syringe
DOC.criteria: Healthy male patient , 18 45 year age , inclusive No history hypersensitivity allergic reaction follow drug administration No history clinically significant clinically relevant cardiac condition No history previous anticancer treatment Body mass index ( BMI ) 1832 kg/m2 , inclusive Positive test result drug abuse Positive test result hepatitis B , hepatitis C , HIV 1 2 Systolic blood pressure great 140 mmHG less 90 mmHG , diastolic blood pressure great 90 mmHG less 50 mmHG Clinically significant abnormal laboratory value
